full_text: “If the West wants to save its zone of peace and prosperity it must welcome Ukraine in and keep Russia out.” Russia’s former foreign minister argues that Putin’s regime is too dangerous to carry on business with when the war ends https://t.co/6CRQKOq6dM

localize.full_text: "西側が平和と繁栄の地帯を守りたいなら" "ウクライナを迎え入れ ロシアを締め出すべきです" ロシアの元外相、プーチン政権は危険すぎて戦争が終わってもビジネスを続けられないと主張 https://t.co/6CRQKOq6dM
